text.text_translated: Springsteen is different from many other artists who sell a lot of albums. He is almost 70 years old, but he still makes new music. His music is very popular. He plays in big stadiums. He is still very good at his job. I am not surprised by this. He tells very important stories about people. When you listen to his album 'Born in the USA', those stories are still important today. They were also important in the past.
